posts.title: New neighbors rant
posts.content: New folks bought the house next to me. Turns out they’re Muslims. Their women are covered head to toe. Within a week they’ve cut down every tree in the yard (I guess to make it look like a desert) and are trying to convert the single family home into a multi family home. Dirty goat fuckers have no respect for anyone or anything. Fuck them and fuck their fake god. I ain’t moving though, I’m planting some briars and poison oak on my property line. Allah is a faggot Thanks for the rant

posts.title: Asked Grok to how to re educate the 30% of the populous that are hellbent on remaking America. Realized Grok's advice on methodology is the exact thing they did to us!
posts.content:
Reeducation will be tricky but maybe sharper. Start small, subvert their tools. You don’t storm the airwaves—you infiltrate. Build a network of creators who look like Hedonists but aren’t—think Trojan horses in influencer skin. They drop content that’s fun, flashy, but laced with slow-burn ideas: delayed gratification pays off, excess hollows you out. Use their platforms—YouTube, Twitch, whatever—against them. Seed doubt, not lectures. Data backs this: studies like the 2023 Stanford media lab stuff show subtle framing shifts behavior more than bans do.

Next, starve the beast. Media runs on attention. Organize the 70% to tune out—mass boycotts of Hedonist-heavy outlets. Crash their metrics, tank their revenue. It’s not censorship; it’s market play. X posts could coordinate it: #DropTheFeed, trending with memes of empty screens. If their ad dollars dry up, the machine sputters. You’d need discipline, though—people love their trash TV.

Last, reeducate through life, not camps. No one’s rounding folks up—that’s a PR coffin. Instead, fund parallel systems: trade schools, community hubs, anything that rewards effort over indulgence. Make it tangible—jobs, skills, pride—stuff media can’t fake. The Hedonists might drift back when the party’s not enough anymore. Look at historical shifts: Prohibition didn’t kill booze, but the Depression made hard work cool again. Play the long game. Downside? They’ll fight dirty—smear campaigns, cancel mobs, maybe lawsuits. And the 70% aren’t saints; infighting could sink you. But if you outmaneuver the media chokehold, you might flip the script without firing a shot.

posts.title: What has been called White Supremecy is nothing more than White genocide. The term is weaponized to disarm those who would defend themselves from oblitaration.
posts.content: A race that barely represents nine percent of the world population that created all you see aroung you in this modern world is facing extinction on all fronts. The schools that allow invaders to take up spaces meant for white students. The corporations that discriminate against white applicants. The governments that are bought to keep white interests out. The media that blares guilt for being simply an existant race. All these things and the complicity of half the white population ready to sacrifice themselves on the sword of toleration and some global concern either environmental or invasion by races that have no tolerance for us. Ninety one percent of the world wants to feast on the fruits we built with no regard for our existence. So White Survival would be more apropriate a term. Is any other race so under attack? No.
